text: The "Germany national futsal team" represents Germany in international futsal team. It was founded in 2015 and they are yet to qualify for the FIFA Futsal World Cup. == Tournament records == ===FIFA Futsal World Cup=== FIFA World Cup Record Year Round Pld W D L GS GA 1989 did not enter 1992 did not enter 1996 did not enter 2000 did not enter 2004 did not enter 2008 did not enter 2012 did not enter 2016 did not enter 2020 did not qualify 2024 did not qualify Total -- -- -- -- -- -- ===UEFA Futsal Championship=== UEFA European Futsal Championship Record Year Round Pld W D L GS GA 1996 did not enter 1999 did not enter 2001 did not enter 2003 did not enter 2005 did not enter 2007 did not enter 2010 did not enter 2012 did not enter 2014 did not enter 2016 did not enter 2018 did not qualify 2022 did not qualify 2026 to be determined Total -- -- -- -- -- -- ==References== Category:National futsal teams Category:National sports teams of Germany
title: Germany national futsal team
